Articles.Content:
So since Moach the moderator was helpful enough to close the last thread right when I got a helpful sugguestion, I am reporting back after trying the read-only trick on the Settings.cfg

That made sense, so I reinstalled and tried, and although the title screen looks like it remembered my settings but my mouse cursor is totally unable to click on any menu option for no good reason... Did you experience this, AndyMt?
